name: Cold Chicken Pasta Salad
author: Say-Rah
summary: A very fresh take on pasta salad. Tweak to your liking with different veggies.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package vermicelli pasta, broken into 2-inch pieces
1 (14 ounce) can plain artichoke hearts, quartered
directions: Whisk olive oil, red wine vinegar, lemon juice, sugar, grated onion, seasoned salt, and basil together in a bowl to make dressing
Combine water and chicken bouillon cubes in a saucepan
Heat over medium heat, stirring until bouillon cubes are dissolved, about 5 minutes
Add chicken breasts and onion; simmer until chicken is no longer pink in the center, about 45 minutes
Transfer chicken to a cutting board using a slotted spoon
Cool chicken until easily handled, 5 to 10 minutes
Pour several cups of water into the reserved broth in the saucepan; bring to a boil
Stir in vermicelli and cook until tender, about 6 minutes
Mix dressing, chicken, and vermicelli together in a bowl
Add artichoke hearts and toss to combine
Refrigerate until flavors combine, 2 to 6 hours
